Place offline stroke assets here for FULL offline playback:

1) hanzi-writer.min.js  (version 2.1.2 recommended)
2) hanzi-writer-data/   (CJK codepoint JSONs, version 2.0)

Layout:
/vendor/hanzi-writer.min.js
/vendor/hanzi-writer-data/8a00.json  (etc.)

The site prefers local /vendor/ assets and bundles/ chars-##.json to guarantee availability on any network.
